caption: Benedict Cumberbatch as Dominic Cummings in "Brexit: The Uncivil War." Cummings led the campaign to take Britain out of the European Union ahead of the 2016 referendum.

result.explanation: The image clearly shows Benedict Cumberbatch portraying Dominic Cummings.  The whiteboard behind him contains relevant notes related to Brexit and the political climate of the time. The entities are all correctly identified and represented in the image and its context.

Benedict Cumberbatch did portray Dominic Cummings in the film "Brexit: The Uncivil War."  Dominic Cummings was a key figure in the campaign to leave the European Union in 2016.  All claims in the caption are verifiable and consistent with established facts.
result.supporting_points: The film "Brexit: The Uncivil War" exists and is about the campaign to leave the EU. Dominic Cummings was a prominent figure in that campaign. Benedict Cumberbatch is an actor known for his roles in various films.
